creator: trevorsky@gmail.com
text:
File: native/iis/jk_isapi_plugin.c
Line: 549-551

The error message defined as HTML_ERROR_500 should be used, however HTML_ERROR_503 is used instead.

Noteworthy is that the length of HTML_ERROR_500 is incorrectly used (there is no risk of buffer overflow since HTML_ERROR_503 is longer than HTML_ERROR_500).

There is a possible enhancement that could be made here, in that these error messages could be made configurable instead of compiled-in constants.
Forgot to mention: this bug was found in the source for tomcat-connectors-1.2.26
creator: trevorsky@gmail.com

text: Many thanks for the report. This has been fixed in svn and will be included in mod_jk 1.2.27 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
